page.title: 10THE CRICKET PITCH AND TEAM.
page.content: As long ago as can be remembered there has been a{cricket field}in Michaelchurch Escley, beside the road between the Post Office and the church.Unfortunantly many years ago this area was{ploughed up}and the village team lost their home pitch. The local men,in order to play cricket,had to travel six miles to {Peterchurch.} In 1984 a decision to move back to the village was taken.The local landowner was contacted and he agreed to hand back{the original site}of the cricket field. This season the team have had fixtures every Sunday.Away matches take them as far away as thirty miles.
